# rotulador: usefull toolbox with random programs

The goal of **rotulador** is to provide a tools to help developers and producers manipulate R objects and outputs.

## Installation

You can install the development version of rotulador from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("TractorTom/rotulador")
```
